Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_USERS_INS_ID_SP" ( P_USER_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_PWD IN VARCHAR2, P_PWD_REQUIRED IN NUMBER, P_USER_TYPE_ID IN NUMBER, /*No longer used*/ P_USER_STATUS_ID IN NUMBER, P_OBS_ID IN NUMBER, P_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_FIRST_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_MIDDLE_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_LAST_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_EMAIL_ADDRESS IN VARCHAR2, P_PHOTO_FILE IN VARCHAR2, P_NOTIFICATION_FLAGS IN NUMBER, /*No longer used*/ P_LOCALE IN VARCHAR2, P_TIMEZONE IN VARCHAR2, P_LANGUAGE_ID IN NUMBER, P_COUNTRY_ID IN NUMBER, P_CURRENCY_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_LOGIN_COUNT IN NUMBER, P_BAD_LOGIN_COUNT IN NUMBER, P_LAST_LOGGED_IN_DATE IN DATE, P_LAST_PWD_CHANGE IN DATE, P_FORCE_PWD_CHANGE IN NUMBER, P_FULL_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_USERS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_USERS ( ID, USER_NAME, PWD, PWD_REQUIRED, USER_STATUS_ID, OBS_ID, DESCRIPTION, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL_ADDRESS, PHOTO_FILE, LOCALE, TIMEZONE, LANGUAGE_ID, COUNTRY_ID, CURRENCY_CODE, LOGIN_COUNT, BAD_LOGIN_COUNT, LAST_LOGGED_IN_DATE, LAST_PWD_CHANGE, FORCE_PWD_CHANGE, FULL_NAME, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_USER_NAME, P_PWD, P_PWD_REQUIRED, P_USER_STATUS_ID, P_OBS_ID, P_DESCRIPTION, P_FIRST_NAME, P_MIDDLE_NAME, P_LAST_NAME, P_EMAIL_ADDRESS, P_PHOTO_FILE, P_LOCALE, P_TIMEZONE, P_LANGUAGE_ID, P_COUNTRY_ID, P_CURRENCY_CODE, P_LOGIN_COUNT, P_BAD_LOGIN_COUNT, P_LAST_LOGGED_IN_DATE, P_LAST_PWD_CHANGE, P_FORCE_PWD_CHANGE, P_FULL_NAME, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); END;
